alert.note: Alert for Coastal Kenedy; Inland Kenedy; Kenedy Island (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 25 at 4:09AM CDT by NWS Brownsville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Kenedy County through 500 AM CDT... At 408 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Riviera Beach, or 8 miles northeast of Sarita, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Armstrong, Sarita, Kenedy County Wind Farms, Norias, U S 77 Border Patrol Station, Kenedy County Sheriffs Office and Armstrong Ranch Airport. This includes US Highway 77 between mile markers 710 and 744. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
